tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a hash collision attack in the connection management codec. Remote attackers can trigger a high CPU load on the server —a form of Hash DoS— by initiating multiple connections with specially crafted, colliding Source Connection IDs (SCIDs) that exploit the hash map used for connection tracking.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a vulnerable version of the package.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `io.netty.incubator:netty-incubator-codec-classes-quic` library to the patch version.
